_sText:
This is a port of a Quake 3 arena Defrag map called Primeskull Valley or [r7-blockworld2](http://ws.q3df.org/map/r7-blockworld2/)

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDXuJu2da8A

With [permission](http://i.imgur.com/Ql6VsIc.png) from the original map maker.

I had to remove/tweak a lot in the map to make it possible in bhop, and some parts i removed because i hit brush limits.

Map should be about 2 ish minutes long if nofailed on auto.

Possible on Scroll and 400 vel cap, should be fun to speedrun too.

This map may be a bit confusing at some parts, try to not give up too quickly.

Let me know if the are any huge exploits or bugs

Video if you dont know where to go:

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6sz761ragjk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
